content: the hat is worked in the round from the bottom up following the chart it is knitted using a technique similar to the marisle technique alternating between garter ridges worked with one strand of each colour held together and double knitting where stitches are worked alternately in one colour or the other the hat is worked straight upwards and then shaped at the top with decreases using garter stitch only the hat features a folded brim which is turned up at the end
